amendment.description: An amendment numbered 119 printed in Part A of House Report 118-261 to prohibit funds for the Environmental Financial Advisory Board of the Environmental Protection Agency.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Ogles amendment (A069) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Ogles amendment (A069) Agreed to by voice vote.
